name: Supa Cuba Dupa VR Exhibition
description: A group art exhibition in Wellington NZ.. Like so many events around the world, got interrupted just days before the launch - I was planning a VR experience in the gallery for the launch - folks would roam the gallery, view the artworks, mingle and meet some of the artists, have a few wines - and when they get to my "exhibit" - a Quest headset 6DoF environment - obeying the same architecture as the gallery -and a ride in a wheelchair to avoid collisions.. alas - my plans were shelved, I decided to simply rebuild the gallery with all the artwork asap, so folks could still see the exhibition.. see http://www.potockipaterson.co.nz
